channel.title: Java MMO/MMORPG Base
channel.description:
Sorry for asking so many questions about Java MMOs :P Does anyone know a good base source and client for a Java MMO/MMORPG?
EDIT: There are no Java MMORPG sources that suit my game framework wants. I have decided to use Unity 3D for my MMORPG.

item.title: Java MMO/MMORPG Base
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:415834”]Fine, since you think your well prepared. There is no base for a java mmo because there are too many libraries released.[/quote]Wrong.

SourceForge

Vyger Online RPG - a mmorpg with Java

Download Vyger Online RPG - a mmorpg with Java for free. Graphic RPG MUD with Java. Fork of Wotlas.sourceforge.net.

Plenty of them out there, wether it’s quality code or not is a different matter.

Read full topic

item.title: Java MMO/MMORPG Base
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Then I guess I must figure out the networking myself. I believe JMonkeyEngine is best suitable since I’m not going to make my own engine. I guess this could be locked unless anybody has something more to contribute o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Java MMO/MMORPG Base
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Fine, since you think your well prepared. There is no base for a java mmo because there are too many libraries released.

Read full topic

item.title: Java MMO/MMORPG Base
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:415834”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=517777.msg3763497#msg3763497 date=1317060505]
Your getting ahead of yourself. Learn things before you try to tackle big things.
[/quote]
^this

You never dive into water without knowing first the basics to swim. If you dive into game development to early you will surely fail. Look into the basics of making a single player game before going into multiplayer development.[/quote]Do I have to say in every post to not say “start easy”? I asked a question, and I want that answered, period. I have done basic game development in Java. I also have 3D experience using Unity 3D. Thank you…

Read full topic

item.title: Java MMO/MMORPG Base
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Your getting ahead of yourself. Learn things before you try to tackle big things.

^this

You never dive into water without knowing first the basics to swim. If you dive into game development to early you will surely fail. Look into the basics of making a single player game before going into multiplayer development.

Read full topic
